titleStmt.title: Burlesque upon burlesque, or, The scoffer scoft being some of Lucians dialogues, newly put into English fustian for the consolation of those who had rather laugh and be merry, then be merry and wise.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Charles, 1630-1687.
Lucian, of Samosata. Dialogi.

notesStmt.note: Written by C. Cotton. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
